item.title: PEDEVCO CORP 10-K
item.description: PEDEVCO CORP, which is in the Crude Petroleum & Natural Gas [1311] industry, SEC 10-K filing on March 11, 2022 had 49897 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: oil - 611 instances company - 599 instances gas - 586 instances may - 489 instances stock - 480 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
